MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G33 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:02am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault investigations required on our underground electricity network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:23am on Saturday 6th February 2021.
